heroSubtitle: Environmentally friendly NFTs by the World’s Greatest Creators
registerTitle: Register now for first access to the world's most exclusive NFT drops
registerTitle2: Register now for first access to the world's most exclusive NFT drops
productBody: Digital collectables are as varied as the passions, lifestyles and hobbies from which they come. Find works, and communities that relate to you. From fantasy art to music to sport or gaming, wherever your passion lives, artefy has you covered.
featuresBody2: Music Fan? Love fantasy art? Into Sci-fi? Or maybe your interest lies in pop culture, graffiti history, war, or even wildlife art. A host of exciting themed collectable sets that include traditional art, mutli-media pieces, virtual collectables and more innovation than you can imagine is coming to Immersive Worlds By Artefy.
detailsBody: We are simplifying the world of NFTs. From easy to set up profiles, to simple payment platforms and user friendly galleries to share your collections with friends, you don’t need to to be a crypto-expert to get started with artefy.
